# ruleEditorRowsDidChange(_:)

**Instance Method**

Notifies the receiver that a rule editor’s rows changed.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func ruleEditorRowsDidChange(_ notification: Notification)
```

## Parameters

- **notification**: A notification named[doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSRuleEditor/rowsDidChangeNotification].

## Discussion

If the delegate implements this method, [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSRuleEditor] automatically registers its delegate to receive [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSRuleEditor/rowsDidChangeNotification] notifications.
